#Text=Pop culture celebrated at Fan Expo Canada 2016 in Toronto
#Text=Wednesday , September 7 , 2016
#Text=The far end of part of the convention floor , shortly after opening Friday .
#Text=Image : Nick Moreau .
#Text=The 22nd Fan Expo Canada took place at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre this weekend , attracting thousands to the event , one of the most popular in North America .
#Text=Crossing between the genres of science fiction , horror , anime , fantasy and comics , the event sprawled throughout all corners of the facility .
#Text=Hundreds of vendors offered products new and old , joined by celebrity guests like Stan Lee , Mark Hamill , and Margaret Atwood .
#Text=Various local fan organizations were there in a charitable capacity , and thousands of fans donned costumes , many of which they themselves created .
#Text=Atwood , a Booker Prize-winner , was there to launch her graphic novel Angel Catbird , with illustrator Johnnie Christmas .
#Text=Lee was making his final Canadian convention appearance , part of a larger farewell tour .
#Text=Hamill 's schedule included a panel with Kevin Conroy , the voice of Batman in Batman : The Animated Series , in which the Star Wars lead played the Joker .
#Text=Ubisoft , Microsoft , and PlayStation VR all had large areas set up for attendees to try their latest games .
#Text=In the 20-minute PlayStation VR demonstration of Batman : Arkham VR , players are dropped down a secret elevator in Bruce Wayne 's manor , to the Bat Cave , to suit up .
#Text=From there , the demonstration took players to investigate the murder of Nightwing .
#Text=The Northern Arena Esports Championship ran throughout the weekend , facing off teams of video gamers in a packed hall .
#Text=Even in early rounds , the event was well attended , with the stands full of gamers , watching the matches with live colour commentary .
#Text=The finals saw US team Cloud9 and Immortals , from Brazil , face off in Counter-Strike : Global Offensive .
#Text=Both unbeaten teams going in , the Brazillian team won the championship and $ 50,000 .
#Text=Gameplay was delayed during the " third map " ( third round ) of the finals , when one Immortals player was caught with their headset off .
#Text=After nearly half an hour , the team was deducted a point , leading to a sudden but temporary rush of success by the US team .
#Text=Playstation VR demo
#Text=Image : Nick Moreau .
#Text=Displays of charity at event
#Text=The Canadian garrison of 501st Legion returned with their setup of photo-ops , with proceeds to the Make-A-Wish Foundation .
#Text=Volunteer organization Comic Corps of Canada collects donations of comics , to distribute to children and youth in the hospital .
#Text=Along with collecting comics on-site , the group was fundraising through raffles and button sales .
#Text=Other charitable fan-based groups included The Ontario Ghostbusters , Doctor Who Society of Canada , and Klingon Assault Group .
#Text=Brampton Spider-Gwen and Symbiote Spidey pose at the Comic Corps booth .
#Text=Image : Nick Moreau .
#Text=A showdown at the 501st Legion booth .
#Text=Image : Nick Moreau .
#Text=Successful Stormtroopers share a high-five .
#Text=Image : Nick Moreau .
#Text=Cosplay celebration of craftsmanship and characters
#Text=Epic Mickey by The Katherinator .
#Text=Image : Nick Moreau .
#Text=The thousands of cosplay outfits on parade around the various halls offered a tremendous cross-section of genres and eras of pop culture .
#Text=The majority of outfits involved at least some elements made from scratch , a fantastic display of craftsmanship .
#Text=Of the thousands , Wikinews spoke with a cosplayer going by the name " The Katherinator " .
#Text=She was outside the building in the gardens , waiting for a photographer she had arranged to shoot her new Epic Mickey costumed character-style outfit .
#Text=With shoes as wide as a forearm , and a rigid torso of carved foam , she remained exuberant even when caught in the traffic between halls , many hours into wearing the outfit .
